snippet: Oklahoma would become the first state to allow the execution of inmates using nitrogen gas under a bill approved 85 to 10 on Tuesday by the State House.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma would become the first state to allow the execution of inmates using nitrogen gas under a bill approved 85 to 10 on Tuesday by the State House.

headline.main: Oklahoma: House Approves Executions by Gas
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: House Approves Executions By Gas
